Simulation of the botÂ¶

Now that we have calibrated our bot, we are ready to see if we can simulate it real time to make sure that the calibration has been done properly & for a 2 way communication check between the application and the bot.

After pressing Calibrate in the previous page, we should be seeing something like this:

Fig 1 : Simulation page.

Again, we can move the bot in 8 different directions.
